credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. Griffith Bailey Coale and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Design for a General Electric Clock Radio
medium: Blue and black pastel, brush and watercolor and gouache, graphite on vellum
description: Rectangular clock radio on yellowed vellum background and base line with white case, blue-green and silverish metal face.  Clock and radio controls on right 2/3rds of case w/speaker on left 1/3. "General Electric" and logo on lower left of speaker section.
name: Drawing
